documents.document: #quotes When we make college more affordable, we make the American dream more achievable.
To command is to serve, nothing more and nothing less. Andre Malraux
People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision. John C Maxwell
For success, attitude is equally as important as ability. - Harry F. Banks
Always count the cost.AmericanProverb
#quotes We're getting hurt, but I'm a long-term investor.
#quotes One cannot too soon forget his errors and misdemeanors. To dwell long upon them is to add to the offense.
The wheel that squeaks the loudest is the one that gets the grease. Josh Billings
"Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else." - Les Brown
A place for everything and everything in its place.AmericanProverb
Character isn't something you were born with and can't change, like your fingerprints. JIM ROHN
#quotes The man who occupies the first place seldom plays the principal part.
The right man is the one who seizes the moment. Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Time is our most valuable asset, yet we tend to waste it, kill it and spend it rather than invest it. Jim Rohn
#quotes Periods of tranquility are seldom prolific of creative achievement. Mankind has to be stirred up.
Success is not access to excess. Anonymous
Ability is the poor man's wealth.AmericanProverb
Better go around than fall into the ditch. AmericanProverb
#quotes A successful life is one that is lived through understanding and pursuing one's own path, not chasing after the dreams of others.
A calamity is often a blessing in disguise. American Proverb
Beauty and folly are old companions. AmericanProverb
When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it. JIM ROHN
The worst disease which can afflict business executives in their work is not, as popularly supposed, alcoholism; it's egotism. Harold S Gene
Death keeps no calendar. AmericanProverb
The secret of business is to know something that nobody else knows. Aristotle Onassis
Every rock strikes the feet of the poor. Afghan Proverb
Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you'll be criticized anyway. Eleanor Roosevelt
The work of the individual still remains the spark that moves mankind ahead even more than teamwork. Igor Sikorsky
#quotes The only yardstick for success our society has is being a champion. No one remembers anything else.
Management must manage! Harold S Geneen
#quotes Many great ideas go unexecuted, and many great executioners are without ideas. One without the other is worthless.
There's no genius behind it. It's persistence and listening to people. Craig Newmark (of Craigslist)
A fish with teeth tastes the same as fish without. Afghan Proverb
Never cut what you can untie. Joseph Joubert
#quotes If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.
Time is our most valuable asset, yet we tend to waste it, kill it, and spend it rather than invest it. Jim Rohn
#quotes Before you can really start setting financial goals, you need to determine where you stand financially.
#quotes Opportunity is a haughty goddess who wastes no time with those who are unprepared.
I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends. Abe Lincoln
#quotes My success, part of it certainly, is that I have focused in on a few things.
To succeed... you need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you. Tony Dorsett
A gem is not polished without rubbing, nor is a man perfect without trials.AmericanProverb
The world of achievement has always belonged to the optimist. Harold Wilkins
In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing. William Wordsworth
I've always believed not matter how many shots I miss, I'm going to make the next one. Isiah Thomas
There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
I am for those means which will give the greatest good to the greatest number. Abe Lincoln
#quotes Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.
#quotes Many marriages would be better if the husband and wife clearly understood that they're on the same side.
Things may come to those who wait, but only things left by those who hustle. Abraham Lincoln
#quotes You only get out of it what you put into it. If you are a sheep in this world, you're not going to get much out of it.
If you sit with us, you will get like us; if you sit beside a cooking pot, you will get black. Afghan Proverb
Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed. Peter Drucker
"When it comes to success, there are no shortcuts." - Bo Bennett
#quotes When you give a man a dole you deny him his dignity, and when you deny him his dignity you rob him his destiny.
Ain't no chance if you don't take it. Guy Clark
Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them. Albert Einstein
#quotes A happy life consists not in the absence, but in the mastery of hardships.
Forget the past, but look out in the future. Afghan Proverb
Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do doesn't mean it's useless. Thomas A. Edison
The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph. Thomas Paine
A friend at hand is better than a relative at a distance.AmericanProverb
The secret to managing is to keep the guys who hate you away from the guys who are undecided. Casey Stengel
In my experience, the best creative work is never done when one is unhappy. Albert Einstein
#quotes The greatest good we can do for others is not just to share our riches with them, but to reveal theirs.
#quotes It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power. Abraham Lincoln
A razor may be sharper than an ax, but it cannot cut wood. African Annang Proverb
"That which does not kill me makes me stronger." - Friedrich Nietzsche
I shall try to correct errors when shown to be errors, and I shall adopt new views so fast as they shall appear to be true views Lincoln
Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities. Walter Scott
Bad luck can't be dated. AmericanProverb
Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones. Ralph Waldo Emerson
There's no substitute for guts. Paul Bear Bryant
#quotes I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat.
#quotes A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
#quotes Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph. Thomas Paine
#quotes Satisfy the deep subconsious needs of your customer-to feel omportant,to feel valued,respected and worthwhile.
#quotes Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
#quotes You don't get everything you want. A dictatorship would be a lot easier.. So long as I'm the dictator.
Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game. Michael Jordan
A small debt makes a debtor, a heavy one an enemy.AmericanProverb
You may well have two legs but you still can't climb two trees at the same time. Afghan Proverb
#quotes Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
The secret of success is constancy to purpose. Benjamin Franklin
#quotes A warrior of light who trusts too much in his intelligence will end up underestimating the power of his opponent.
There are many paths to the top of the mountain, but the view is always the same. Chinese Proverb
It is not so important who starts the game but who finishes it. John Wooden
Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results. Albert Einstein
A house is not a home.AmericanProverb
#quotes I love America. We've got the only system that works - it keeps everyone hustling.
#quotes In the realm of ideas everything depends on enthusiasm.. in the real world all rests on perseverance.
#quotes You will either step forward into growth or you will step back into safety.
Whenever an individual or a business decides that success has been attained, progress stops. Thomas J. Watson
The seeker is the finder. Afghan Proverb
It is not fair to ask of others what you are unwilling to do yourself Eleanor Roosevelt
#quotes There's not a lot you can do about the national economy but there is a lot you can do about your personal economy.
#quotes In the new economy, information, education, and motivation are everything.
The last dejected effort often becomes the winning stroke. W.J. Cameron
